description: This file defines a custom exception class named SimpleBankingGlobalException that extends RuntimeException, used for handling global exceptions in the banking application.

classes.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException
classes.description: A custom runtime exception class for global exception handling in the banking project.

methods.name: SimpleBankingGlobalException(String message)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the exception with a message by calling the superclass constructor.
